data.description: Spacious 1 bedroom condo in Buckhead. Large top floor unit, large bedroom and bathroom with walk in closet. Full Laundry room with extra storage space. Low HOA dues! Community is gated, has a pool, grills, clubhouse, and a gym. Conveniently located near Lenox and 400 and 85.
